title: Final Stand
description: Some destinies can’t be altered.Dominique defeated Tavion, but can’t escape her dark fate. With her protectors fearing for her life, she is forced to leave her friends and flee Houston. Yet Tavion’s deadly influence still runs deep. His voice swirls in Dominique’s head, whispering of a secret connection binding them together.But Tavion isn’t her only enemy.A new threat reveals itself when Dominique’s car is ambushed, forcing her to face a chilling truth—someone close to her is a traitor. Desperate for answers, she seeks the aid of the friends she left behind. But it may be too late. The voice in her head becomes more sinister with each message, and Dominique is powerless to stop it. With the darkness growing inside her, Dominique and her friends travel back in time. United in a final, desperate stand, Dominique will do whatever it takes to save herself. Or die trying.
author: Rose Garcia
